service.visible: once loaded, additional trackers are presented in the Tracker Editor
service.name: A collection of GPS Trackers for the AllSport Moto Cellphone GPS Service
service.comment: The Personal Tracker Platform service must be installed
service.explanation: Allows you to add GPS Trackers to your MedCommons Account
service.charges: There is no fee for this module
service.technical: These additional Trackers are presented to the user for inclusion.
